refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns the number of audio channels in the underlying hardware.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Returns the maximum number of audio channels in the underlying hardware. This does not necessarily correspond to the number of channels used by Csound (set by nchnls and nchnls_i).

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: On init-pass idacc will contain the number of channels in the output device, and iadcc, the number of input channels. These will correspond to the currently selected/in-use hardware devices.
